page.title: 11Entertainment
page.content: Organised leisure is poorly provided for the younger people of this area. Apart from a{playgroup}for the pre-school age group and local{horse {riding stable,}there is little else for the{U18}age group, except for their own hobbies and interests. There are two traditional{public houses located in{Stanford Dingley,}whose clientele come from considerable distances especially in the summer. The small public house at{Tutt's Clump is mainly used by locals. There is only one{restaurant}in the area, found in Stanford Dingley, which provides set meals ( a table must be booked in advance ), and customers are invited to bring their own drink to have with the meal. The restaurant is open daily for cream teas between April and September.
